lines.name: MATT

lines.text: I wouldn't abandon you, I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. What about us, though? If we don't say yes, are you going to kill us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to kill you unless you give me a reason to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if we say no to this Traveler--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not a good reason and he knows I love you all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But are you with her for the long haul? Because she has great faith in you, we have heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I would never let that faith down."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is such a presence of personality and slick, in spite of your prickly nature--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- a likable quality to him that you have no idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But backing up to the Traveler Con a bit, your plan is to get 200 people together and just trick them with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we, okay, here is the thing: we have to figure it out, okay? It's a lot of pressure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I feel like if you're going to establish a group that's supposed to support each other or be there for each other, you need to give them something, and I'm not talking about an object or money or anything, like, something to be faithful in, a set of guidelines, presets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what we got to figure out, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something to follow, a code, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's what the whole point of Traveler is to not have that, we just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like what do you believe in, man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want the world to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When people talk about you, what do you want them to say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This would actually help me a lot because I am very bad at this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has been describing you to people in pamphlets, I'm sure you've seen them, as a really cool guy--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not seen any of these pamphlets, "show me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This gargantuan body holding this tiny pamphlet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- a really cool guy who does really cool things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but, I mean, this pamphlet, while amazingly designed and beautiful--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't feel it's a, it's not something that your followers would carry around and be like, "Have you read this book?" You know, it's not, it doesn't have that heft to it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I think what I want right now "is to successfully "continue "to build a religious cult--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- where only-- (laughter) "-- where only you and I "and the rest of us know the truth "because my, what a trick that would be."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I mean, first off, maybe use club instead, club or organization.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just thought it was a fun term already thrown out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am also sensing a theme of more of a rejection of norms and structure--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So perhaps the message is throwing off the shackles of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one can see this over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So your objective is to have fun and not to achieve some sort of tax-exempt status, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no interest in monetary gain, "if that's what you're inquiring about."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if no one's getting (sighs) hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bought enough fabric so all of us can be high priests at Traveler Con.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we sidebar for a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Extremely shitty people being tricked "is so much more fun "and there are so many shitty people "just waiting to be tricked."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just, if that's part of your thing, I don't know how I feel about that, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand where your concern lies, "but have you found yourself trusting "and caring for other people and yet "keeping things secret to yourself to keep them safe? "To make them feel comfortable?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like that's different, but yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I mean, you gave me a lot of powers, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're still "scrubbing the paint from that temple, by the way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't want to deal with the day-to-day struggles of being a god, you want to retire--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why do you think the gods went behind the Divine Gate? "Because it was to preserve the things they created? "Because of the damage of the Calamity? No! "They got bored of having to do "the bidding of every mortal at their feet "and they left to take vacation forever "and occasionally send a bit of power their way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wonder if we help create the best Traveler Con that ever was, if maybe we could make it a full circle and you could help us with some of those shitty people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We know, we have seen it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As long as you have her around, you'll have me around."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we would have to put on a very good show, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm kind of, I'm kind of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those things have repercussions on a grander scale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes, if you trick dumb, stupid, idiotic people, it informs the rest of their lives.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am talking about the most intelligent, ruthless people in this world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was a big fan of practical jokes and, I mean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things could get out of hand on occasion. It's been a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to speak more on the subject right now, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you just don't know how to escape."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you just, you just have to bamf away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's only a problem if you remain to be there for it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could show you a few tricks."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I cast Seeming and everyone is wearing green robes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even have to buy the stupid fabric!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a big smile curl across his face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have done a great many great things together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in control of ourselves, we do not have to harm anyone unless they are people who deserve to be harmed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is a super intense responsibility and kind of requires a certain amount of ego to say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, my name is Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I can subscribe to that, but I owe Jester a great deal and it would be unconscionable not to help you with whatever path you're moving towards, either for the delight of crowds or to keep anything from getting out of hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree that, I mean, I'm just here for Jester as well and if these people are going to come to the volcano and expect something, I suppose it would be more fulfilling for them to get some sort of a show than to leave disappointed and empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I still would like to, I'd prefer it if they were set up with some sort of path to success or happiness rather than just being tricked for trickery's sake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. We want them to be happy, it-- it feels good to believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your belief in the Traveler has helped you a great deal, not just because he's bestowed upon you powers, but also, he's given you friendship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it would be nice to give the other people at your con that same potential.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I was just, you know, I really did think you were always around and now, I feel like maybe that's asking a lot of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(sighs) I think, if we pull this off, "and if we do it right, we could leave "199 or so individuals "still content, with new friends, "some defined direction, perhaps, "in the way they go through their day-to-day "as they slowly walk towards the days of dust, "and I'll have more time to be around you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If Jester has faith the Traveler, that's good enough for me, I suppose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you are the poster child.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is the story that you'll tell as the, I mean, are you going to do a demonstration of the gifts he's given you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That could be pretty cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, Caleb, you could do some really cool stuff, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or what if you walked into there just in tattered clothing because you're just a peasant girl with nothing, you're even feeble, your hands don't work or something like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I could have no hands!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then, because of the Traveler, you can paint amazingly or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you saying "an organized religious event would fake "an individual's rise from a low place "to a high one for the purpose of "convincing the masses that there is a miracle? "Such a thing's never been done."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that's what you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you fuck them a little bit because, I mean, that's just, you got to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you want, you want storytellers, you want, you want showmanship, you want people who will (sighs) create, create events, create art, create things that people will see that will confound them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To take this story and then begin to share their own."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you want to show them the truth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how you build a religion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, how did you end up with that name in the first place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought jesters were people that made people laugh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You thought that, you chose your name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your mother did not name you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she did, but she told me I get to choose my own name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your name used to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think tieflings-- do tieflings, there's a thing for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have a name before this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did your mother call you before Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like Jester, okay? Jester, jeez.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you can call me Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No sense to lie about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you just show who you are on a grand scale, which is pretty grand already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel pretty great right now. (sighs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we tell Jester's true story, but it sounds like you'll still need something fabricated to make you disappear or fly away or whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've got a few weeks to workshop it, don't worry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We've to figure this out, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But while you're here and you seem to have quite the range of vision, is there anything we should ask about the Stones and your particular journey, Caduceus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (giggles) They think you're going to answer things for them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't be so foolish as to ask you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For all that you have done before, I thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(chuckles) "Nevertheless, sorry to intrude upon your breakfast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where do you go when you are not here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think I'm going to visit an old friend."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, travel safe, friends." He steps back into the doorway where he originally emerged as the tree begins to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! He said every time we ask, somebody on the Council dies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Think we can go backwards so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With proper training, you can learn to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there in the center is a beautiful glass relief in the shape of a carved dick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up and I grab one of the flowers and I give it to Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did it spit out my monkey before it solidified?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. He was lying to you your whole life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He never was like, "Jester, I'm a god." I was like, "Oh my god, you're so powerful, "you must be a god." I said it to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He didn't correct you. That's the same as lying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not the same as lying, that's just not saying--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we call it lying by omission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the same time, he has helped you complete many miracles, we have seen it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will admit, I don't get the appeal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I've never seen anyone that wasn't in the service to a god be able to do things that I've done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There has been this part of me, for a long time, that I was 100% convinced, I talked about it with Fjord at one point. I think I did, or maybe I imagined it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was a figment of your imagination that you just birthed and then went off and then it's all just you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you think I could do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel kind of validated as well, so I hope you feel even more validated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how we would verify that, either, that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I consider that to be very impressive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So he, but he wasn't a real little kid when he met you, that's how he befriended you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He made himself appear that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounds like you also told him what he needed to hear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's asking for your help at Traveler Con--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But more than that, over the past-- how old are you? 14, 15? I have no concept of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, that's how you act, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He needs you, he needs your validation, he needs your support--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but that's pretty impressive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester can I you an important question? He's never asked you to harm anyone, right? All these tricks, they're not at the physical expense of anyone, everyone's going to be safe and have a laugh afterwards, right? It's not ever going to end in someone being hurt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you guys have seen that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but only in defense of yourself and us, not for giggles and shits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just going out and killing someone, what's the point, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's looking for fun, he's not looking to strangle anyone or something like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't tell if you walked up to that or not, I really can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I admit, I don't know a ton about them, but I do feel like, you know, the story on cults is that, I don't know, people normally die or worse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the only, the only, (sighs) the only experience I have with cults outside of, apparently, my own is, is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and they were real bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we a cult? Oh man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He literally said you were a cult.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what he said, Fjord!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I think this, I think Traveler Con could be the deciding factor, it could be the turning point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of making it a cult versus a religion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could look at this as a, not a problem, but a, a cult-otunity, like an opportunity, to make a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be good, to make these people have good lives and, or at least, I don't know, it's a cult.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree, well, the semantics, cult, religion, what is very obvious is that he trusts in you, as do we, and if he is looking to you for guidance, if you are his number one, perhaps you have the ability to decide what this is in the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah, that's the thing, I think I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we got to figure this out, I mean, like (sighs)--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel about being able to decide what he will become?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel a little overwhelmed, I'm not going to lie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But what does he really want, then? If he doesn't want to be a god?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did get a sense of ego.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really powerful, he's super cool, and he's very handsome now that I've actually seen his face, it is as handsome as I thought it was going to be--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The hair's a bit much, but sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder how he gets them like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He should obviously tweeze a little.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you need just some time to mull it over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone fell asleep in the last one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regardless, we're here for you and we trust you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if you want to put on a great show for these people, we'll help you do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it would be helping them, right? I mean, how much of a bummer would it be if they all got out to Traveler Con and then it was like, "Just kidding"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With, like, a mattress on the ground or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just need some time to let this sink in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This doorway is really beautiful, though, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a little dick in glass.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does that look like a big dick to you? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The whole door isn't shaped like a dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was the whole door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought it grew, I thought it was a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a door and there's a little glass relief--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've just going to leave one of my Traveler shrines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys heading deeper into the jungle in the direction that you were previously traveling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going right in, bing, oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, who is, what's the marching order here as you continue into the jungle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got seven and a half more hours of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might get some customization if you're going on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like a big mossy green like whatever would be the swamp Keyleth special.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay so the shoulders topped with grizzle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that mean you want to put Fjord up front with Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right and then it would probably be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, where do you want to be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll go in the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, jangling in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you and Fjord both make perception checks, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Continuing forward, you catch, pretty early into the first hour or so of your travel, small patches of dark blue and purple fungus that's set in some of the trees where an oddly-colored mushroom grows out of a strange material that appears strung to or attached to elements of tree trunks and nearby rocks, just little patches of strange fungus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem odd. Are you odd?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm talking to this guy over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check, if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's different and you're uncertain if it's naturalness-based because its coloration and its placement is very splotchy and definitely contrasts with the general themes and coloration of the jungle around you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to tap it with the tip of my-- I'm going to back up a bit and just tap a bit with the tip of my crystal staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (tapping) It shifts slightly, doesn't seem to react from the impact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it resemble any kind of component or ingredient that I ever worked with at the Academy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But not only that you don't recognize it, you're fairly certain in all of your research, this is something that has not-- you've not come across in your time at school, which lets you know that this isn't something that you've used previously or learned about as a material component.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a small knife and just give it a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do catch as you're cutting through is the fungus is pretty thick, but as you cut it away, behind it is a waxy-like substance, a beeswax-type material that is coated over the section of the tree where the fungus is growing from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take that fungus and I will wrap it in some cloth and put it away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will pull up some flame in my hand with a cantrip and just hold it close to the wax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to rapidly burn away, due to your pressure and the heat, it begins to give way to bones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because the trees are made of bones? I feel like you're not sharing enough information.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you mean the tree has bones or there are little bones shoved in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the tree isn't bones but the wax substance that is there that the fungus is growing out of, it looks like it's trapping in something that had bones.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so the fungus is growing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, medicine, medicine check for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is damage to the bones, they are scarred, pockmarked across the surface, and you gather the damage to be acidic in nature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acidic damage killed a thing and then they--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something's going to do acid damage around here, something's going to do acid damage around here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start looking around at plants that look like they could shoot out acid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So some sort of living thing is either collecting creatures and sealing them in after they have disposed of them or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be coming into contact with some very unusual creatures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things that you've never seen before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things that nobody's ever seen before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Upon this site, you shall build a menagerie "whose beasts shall be my gift to the Changebringer "to remind her that nature is infinite." We're going to see some interesting things, many of them possibly dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to write stuff like that down for the Traveler, too? I mean, some really cool--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you help me? Did you write that stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course not. These are the same stories that have been told in my family for generations.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just say that we've had those for generations and share them with the rest of the people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we need to get them first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, why do we keep doing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out for whatever it is we attracted--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the same type of fungus, but it's growing, and whereas previously it was small, little stalks, some of them are three inches in diameter and the actual ends, the caps, are about that big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping a Resistance buff up as I walk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we meet at Coachella? No--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know you from Instagram?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sadly, you do not recognize these.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Press on quietly, keep an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, Fjord, both make perception checks once more for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe four or five feet from end to end and about two and a half feet tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just come upon one, just over cresting an area, you see it about 30, 35 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the canopy of branches above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the same the fungus growing beyond it and it's slowly eroding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Within 60 feet, any celestial, fiend, or undead presence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If not, I'll let him chance his way on the ground to get a closer look.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: There's enough of a bush here that you could--

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: But you get advantage if your buddy--

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage does not give you sneak attack.

lines.text: Oh! Fucking had to roll one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you miss and you damage yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does the-- what does it do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do? What does it say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you roll a one, you suffer one D6 piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush, hide, dive through in the bush, turn around and fire and it just goes (impact)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- back into you. Nott, does that finish your turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You squash that thing like the bug it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For flavor, I'll say he just does it with a palm, goes (slam), and then just takes the body and chucks it into the underbrush and I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sprays part of you, Yasha, and then as the monkey lifts it, it (raspberries) goes up against the rest of you and you are just coated in purple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So when he chucks it, he just goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then he's going to King Kong over towards the group 40 feet, look over their shoulders--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not enough room to go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stomping) Stomping over there, you crush that element there and there is one right next to Beauregard that you can get to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull back, thinking it's probably dead, and it slowly (cracking) gets back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can push past this tree and try for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push over into this space.

lines.text: Does that count because it's weirdly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I'll do the one-- I'll do the hexed one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six plus nine is 15 plus four is 19 plus seven is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 to that one? After pushing the tree with your body, as its cracking down, you splat that one that's hexed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have another attack or just the one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's just the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, in the distance, other movement.

lines.text: So finishing your go, Jester, that brings us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not even going to move, just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a, yeah, I believe so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They got a high dex. All right, that finishes your go? Or are you going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's skittering through their legs, trying to not get smashed and you're just watching this.

lines.text: Is this another bug hunt, sir?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to dodge the mammoth feet and the gorilla feet and just once again take my staff and just like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An 18 for a 28 and a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's rushing around, it's escaping through the mammoth's legs and the monkey goes and slams towards the ground and it just avoids it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward and take the-- yeah, don't, you're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay, that's okay, that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Learn from Sam's gif mistakes last campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pushes through the armor and it just goes (squeaks) limp on the ground, no longer moving.

lines.text: Before I un-restrain myself, I feel like we should pass these out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Who wants the big one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! I'll hold the monkey's for a minute.

lines.text: Or at least a few of us out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll drop my Polymorph.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, Caleb comes up to-- Capeleb comes up to the mammoth and just sort of like you're petting a horse only (pants) and then swings up and plants himself up on top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to ride on top of the mammoth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I try to plant two feet and not squish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 2d6 for me, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of bludgeoning damage and are pinned beneath a giant gorilla.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stands up and grabs her by the ankle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run over to Yasha and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try to get my flask out of her.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: You're going to try to swipe it, you're not even going to, you're going to try to sneak it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to sneak it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit, you actually catch Nott! You like, after everyone's taken a moment, and you're like, the blood's on you and you're wiping it a bit and you walk over and you just take, everyone's settling down for a minute and you feel this tug and you glance behind you and Nott is pulling the flask--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to slap her without even looking.

lines.text: What are you talking about? You shot just fine.

lines.text: It's true, I saw her shoot herself in the eyeball.

lines.text: I shot myself in the eyeball.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: Because either you can keep it--

lines.text: The large broken tree that's now on its side, the dust settled that was kicked up from its impact.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Caduceus and Fjord at the front, Beau and was it Caleb?

lines.text: Was that clean dirt insect poop?

lines.text: You can inspect the insects or inspect the space around it if you wanted to try and figure it out.

lines.text: Do you want to look inside one of the opened up pale scorpion things? Simple biology, just take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just open up the guts, look in the stomach sac.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Nott, you should take some of those poison sacs inside of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to help get those out because I'm good at medicine.

lines.text: Go ahead and roll a medicine and a nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When they're put together, it becomes like a white foam that then burns and solidifies into this cocoon-like wax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get them in vials.

lines.text: You have enough for probably one application.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them combined can probably affect--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acidic wax, you could say, compound, acidic wax compound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's plenty of other ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try it again.

lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll another medicine check.

lines.text: That didn't count, that slipped out of my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's kind of what you do with a die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you just barely manage to pull another set of these glands from one of the other corpses without them accidentally touching and combining and setting off a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of these bodies have been damaged heavily from the battle and there's only maybe one or two others that even are viably intact to withdraw from, but you barely succeeded in not hurting yourself in this process.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jungle deer, bears, other jungle cats, massive lizards, all sorts of creatures, all immortalized in these sculptures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like they're actually sculptures or do they look like creatures that have been turned to stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you guys like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to touch the water, smell it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go to the cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Splash splash splash splash splash splash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really pretty water, though, hm?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could always check the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could just walk down there and see what's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I'm at the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think there's anything down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see? Can we see the bottom? It's real clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you can do that individually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll say just for the heck of it, while they were doing that inspection, that Caleb hit himself with some Fortune's Favor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we're walking, these statues of these beasts, do they have a base or platform or do they seem to be perfectly carved animals on the earth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, some of them are sunken in a bit to the ground, but they don't have a set base or a solid platform or dais, they're just sculptures set in the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's a good call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I already checked it out, they're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see some are adorned in travel attire, some in battle attire, some are captured in a moment of heroic struggle, some are visibly worn, many are kept well enough to appear polished and new, it's a variety.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any that are strange, out of the ordinary type animals we've never seen before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, as we're walking over to the cave, do you mind if I swim alongside you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be careful not to drink the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seemed so happy to poke the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think that perhaps these animals drank of the water and turned to stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to find out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got some stuff that I could try to use.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does the surgeon general's warning label say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has to be recently petrified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got to be a rapid application.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These things are just really cool statues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing-- There's no statues poised in fear or anything or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that ominous sense begins to come over you as you begin to see some of these arrayed in positions of people trying to possibly defend themselves as groups.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A handful of people you've started to find and they're getting more and more numerous the closer to the cave you get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know that this would ever come in handy, but I'm going to cast Water Breathing on everyone in the party for 24 hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you can all breathe underwater just in case you find the need to dive under the waves of the lake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in the cave, you're walking towards it along the northern bank to the western side--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have to go through the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just in case it's a visual thing and water can help refract, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to start inspecting these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 15 feet from them, another pair of figures captured in stone resemble your sister, Calliope, her face resolute and her body fallen at an odd, stiff angle, while the other resembles your father, Cornelius, seeming to try and pull her from the dirt like a heavy chunk of a tree, he himself captured in stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you, is this, they were petrified?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to slowly start pushing everyone back into the treeline.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not everybody, but it's a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that burns a big spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then we have to preserve the statues, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just have to fight somewhere else than here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How fast can we-- well, we'll find out how--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this like a minotaur? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a massive-looking bull creature, larger than any bull you've ever seen, its body swollen and muscular, metal-plated, in a colossus-type way, but jagged and not meeting properly and these giant spines protruding from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the metal plates are not natural on it? I guess we'll find out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rushing towards you immediately at about maybe 60 or so feet from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far from the shore are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll figure that out next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are pretty close to the shore and just began to move away when you heard this and turned and saw it, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, it'd be real bad to let this thing get near any of these, wouldn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Complicated battle ahead.What a reason to tune in! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a reason they hadn't gotten back to you or been home in a while.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You knew something was going on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knew something was going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Well, we'll pick this up next Thursday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stay tuned tomorrow at 7:00pm on our Twitch channel to watch live our Monsterhearts one-shot with these two lovely people with two other very lovely people.
